name: Marta S
text: Love love love blaze pizza! This location didn‚Äôt disappoint us. Fresh ingredients and delicious pizza as usual. We had lunch outside as there were tables available and social distancing was respected. Manager was very nice and came to make sure we were enjoying our food. Restrooms were closed, I guess due to the pandemic.

name: Chris Charles
text: Wow...I just ordered a pesto, mixed vegetable and Gorgonzola pizza and what I received looked more like dry breadsticks. They simply missed all of the vegetables. I wish I had checked the pizza before arriving at home. I am seriously amazed and shocked . Check your Pizza before leaving! I posted some pictures of the order and the result.

name: Connie M
text: This is a fun place to get pizza. You wait in line and they make your pizza right in front of you for a very reasonable price. ‚Ä¶More

name: Wil Michael
text: Very good pizza. The staff were exemplary and the location was very clean. Not the cheapest but it is a great place to grab a little lunch.

name: viddy droog

text: Pizza is good, just order in person. Every single time I order online and show up 30 min later the pizza hasn't even gone in. Online order will always take two to three times as long. Really got to work on that.

name: Amber Celeste Ventura
text: Love This pizza place! The staff is so friendly. You can customize your pizza, making it near impossible to dislike it (and if you do it's your fault rarely theirs, because you made it how you wanted). The service is fast, even when the lines are long. One of my favorite places to go for pizza.

name: Consuelo HolguinMoreno
text: Great place.  Build your own pizza or choose one off the menu. Went to the one off Mission and they only had one size and to order large you have to do it online. Wasn't hard, I did it in the place and still got my pizza in 10 or15 minutes.

name: DRD TRD
text: The family loves the DIY kits. Great idea especially now that we have to be stuck at home. Keeps the kids busy.

name: Macy White
text: We had a great time here with my friends, one of my friends pizzas was taken by someone else, but Heather and her crew made his pizza again. The pizza was so tasty!

name: Inez D'Souza
text: The food is great. There are so many options so it's good for everyone. There are delicious vegetarian or vegan options and amazing seasonal vegetables. There are various types of cheese, sauces,meats,and veggies. I recommend this for anyone and everyone

text: We've experienced Blaze Pizza a handful of times over this last month. What an awesome place. Blows MOD out of the water!
